basics.name: Beatriz Campbell Rodrigues
basics.label: Sales Coordinator
basics.summary: I'm a Sales Coordinator with 3+ years of experience, currently living in the Netherlands. I have a technological degree in Information Management Technology and postgraduate degree in Strategic Management of Innovation and Entrepreneurship from the São Paulo State Technological College (FATEC).

work.name: Cargill
highlights: Assist the Inside Sales team with key process execution and sales activation including, but not limited to, samples, quality assurance, pricing requests, customer agreements and ad hoc support.

work.name: Cargill via JP Gray
highlights: Creation of quotes, Long Term Suppliers Declaration requests, sample requests and quality requests.

work.name: Primark
highlights: Ensured that the store looks good for the customer, folding, aligning and sorting clothes by size and price, and finding places for new collections.
Supervised customers entering and leaving changing rooms, sorting out clothes and putting them back in the right place.
Ensured that the department is replenished at all times, checking if all sizes are available and filling empty gaps.
Helped customers complete their purchases at checkout tills.

work.name: Primark
highlights: Supported management in certain departments, delegating tasks to sales employees and ensuring work quality.
Assisted sales employees at the checkout with privileged tasks such as opening/closing tills, giving discounts and declaring tax-free purchases.
Ensured correct management of the team and products in order to maximize sales results, identifying and promoting best-seller items.
Review sales reports and perform additional administrative tasks.

work.name: K2 Software
work.summary: Software House specializing in the development of solutions, with automation tools Administrative and Consulting.
highlights: Support level 2 for Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution developed by the company, dealing with Point Of Sales (POS), Production Planning Control (PPC), fiscal integration, warehouse, invoice, import/export and finance management, and database schema recovery.
Developed a custom time tracking software using fingerprint recognition devices for a wholesale and retail client.
Developed general and custom reports for core business processes.

education.area: Strategic Management of Innovation and Entrepreneurship
